column1: apoc.load.directory.async.add(name, cypher, pattern, urlDir, {}) YIELD name, status, pattern, cypher, urlDir, config, error - Add or replace a folder listener with a specific name, pattern and url directory that execute the specified cypher query when an event is triggered and return listener list
apoc.load.directory.async.list() YIELD name, status, pattern, cypher, urlDir, config, error - List of all folder listeners
apoc.load.directory.async.remove(name) YIELD name, status, pattern, cypher, urlDir, config, error - Remove a folder listener by name and return remaining listeners, if any
